des: "This dip is good for New Year's parties and Super Bowl parties. It works well with  beer.  Serve with chips, crackers, veggies or taco chips."
ins: In a medium bowl, beat cream cheese until smooth.  Stir in onion and beef.  Beat in milk, a little at a time, until dip is the consistency of a thick pea soup.  Stir in seasoning.  Refrigerate 8 hours or overnight before serving.
